item.title: Shannon add a quote by Kate Chopin
item.description: "The voice of the sea speaks to the soul." -- Kate Chopin

item.title: Shannon add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "At eighteen our convictions are hills from which we look; at forty-five they are caves in which we hide." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Shannon add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "How strange to have failed as a social creature—even criminals do not fail that way—they are the law's "Loyal Opposition," so to speak. But the insane are always mere guests on earth, eternal strangers carrying around broken decalogues that they cannot read." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "My skin is kind of sort of brownish pinkish yellowish white. My eyes are greyish blueish green, but I'm told they look orange in the night. My hair is reddish blondish brown, but its silver when its wet, and all the colors I am inside have not been invented yet." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "...I am writing these poems from inside a lion..." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "I want an Oompa-Loompa!' screamed Veruca." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "The witching hour, somebody had once whispered to her, was a special moment in the middle of the night when every child and every grown-up was in a deep deep sleep, and all the dark things came out from hiding and had the world all to themselves." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Shannon add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "All good writing is like swimming underwater and holding your breath." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Shannon add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer
